name: GreedGems
title: Greed
rules: ԍGems

name: GreedJewelry
title: Greed
rules: ԍJewelry

name: GreedPearls
title: Greed
rules: ԍPearls

name: GreedTrinkets
title: Greed
rules: ԍTrinkets

name: GreedCoins
title: Greed
rules: ԍCoins

name: GreedHate
title: Captain Freaks Out!
rules: The game ends now. Someone gets shot.

name: GreedApathy
title: Loading the Gun!
rules: The game ends after one more round. Someone gets shot.

name: GreedLike
title: Captain fell asleep?!
rules: The game ends now. No-one gets shot.

name: Admire
title: Admire
rule1of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Gain 2 treasures.
rule2of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Swap 2 treasures.
rule3of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Lose 2 treasures.

name: Bribe
title: Bribe
rules: Lose a coin, Gain an item.

name: Cajole
title: Cajole
rule1of3: Lose an item, gain a coin.
rule2of3: Add 2 coins from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Deceive
title: Deceive
rule1of3: Take a treasure from a player. Give them a treasure.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Entertain
title: Entertain
rules: Gain 1 treasure per worker already on this card.

name: Flirt
title: Flirt
rule2of2: Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.

name: Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1of3: Lose a coin, Gain an item.
rule2of3: Gain a coin, Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule1of3: Gain a coin, Gain a treasure.
rule2of3: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure from the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Lose a coin, Bury a treasure.

name: Investigate
title: Investigate
rule1of3: Lose a coin, look at the bottom card of the Greed deck.
rule2of3: Lose a coin, look at the top card of the Greed deck. Take another turn.
rule3of3: Lose a coin, reveal the next behavior card. Take another turn.

name: Jeer
title: Jeer
rule3of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's Loot.

name: Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rules: Lose 1 or 3 treasures.

name: Lie
title: Lie
rule1of3: Remove a Captain meeple then take another turn.
rule2of3: Add or remove a Captain meeple then take another turn.

name: Menace
title: Menace
rules: Take a treasure from another player.

name: Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rule1of2: Choose a player. Trade a treasure with that player.
rule2of2: Give a player a coin. Move that player's worker. Take another turn.

name: Orate
title: Orate
rule2of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Quibble
title: Quibble
rule1of3: Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Take a random Buried treasure from a player. Give that player a treasure.

name: Rage
title: Rage
rules: Lose 2 treasures per empty slot on this card.

name: Steal
title: Steal
rules: Take 2 coins from another player.

name: Trick
title: Trick
rule1of3: Take an item from another player. Give that player a coin.
rule2of3: Add a treasure from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Vomit
title: Vomit
rules: Bury a treasure per worker on this card.

name: Whine
title: Whine
rule2of3: Add 3 Captain meeples then Bury a treasure.
rule3of3: Add 2 treasures from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Yell
title: Yell
rule1of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: Add a treasure from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Gem
title: Item
rules: Gem

name: Jewelry
title: Item
rules: Jewelry

name: Pearl
title: Item
rules: Pearl

name: Trinket
title: Item
rules: Trinket

name: c1
rules: When you Lose a treasure to the captain, you may place it into the Captain's Greed.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you Gain coins from the captain, Gain an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: You are treated as having one more Buried treasure of your choice for scoring purposes.
title: Andrew

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures with the captain you may swap 1 additional treasure.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: Instead of taking a treasure from the captain, you may swap a treasure with the Captain's Greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 7 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: When you gain and lose a treasure in the same round, you may also add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
title: Berrett

name: c17
rules: At the end of the game before anyone gets shot; Bury two of your treasures.
title: Dwayne

name: c19
rules: Whenever you lose an item without gaining a treasure, you main Gain a coin from the captain.
title: Alison

name: c20
rulesNotAbility: When any other player activates this card, take a coin from them. You may not activate it.
title: Bryson

name: c21
rulesNotAbility: When any other player activates this card, take a coin from them.
rule3of3: Gain a coin. Swap a treasure with the Captain's Greed.
title: Jacob

name: capt1
rulesNotAbility: When play reaches the Captain, reveal another greed card.
rule3of3: Swap a treasure with the Captain's loot.
title: The Captain
